trans-unit.source: Defines a group of type faces having a similar basic design and certain variations in styles.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> from the specified generic font family.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.GenericFontFamilies"></xref> from which to create the new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> with the specified name.
Passing empty string ("") for the `name` parameter causes an exception.
The name of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
name is an empty string ("").
-or-
name specifies a font that is not installed on the computer running the application.
-or-
name specifies a font that is not a TrueType font.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> in the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref> with the specified name.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the name of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref> that contains this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
name is an empty string ("").
-or-
name specifies a font that is not installed on the computer running the application.
-or-
name specifies a font that is not a TrueType font.
Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
Calling <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily.Dispose%2A> allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily> to be reallocated for other purposes.
Call <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>.
The <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily> in an unusable state.

After calling <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily> was occupying.

For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
Always call <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>.
Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily> object's `Finalize` method.
Indicates whether the specified object is a <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> and is identical to this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
The object to test.
`true` if obj is a and is identical to this ; otherwise, `false`.
Returns an array that contains all the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects associated with the current graphics context.
An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects associated with the current graphics context.
Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
Gets a generic monospace <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> that represents a generic monospace font.
Gets a generic sans serif <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> object that represents a generic sans serif font.
Gets a generic serif <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> that represents a generic serif font.
Returns the cell ascent, in design units, of the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> of the specified style.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> that contains style information for the font.
The cell ascent for this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> that uses the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref>.
Returns the cell descent, in design units, of the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> of the specified style.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> that contains style information for the font.
The cell descent metric for this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> that uses the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref>.
Gets the height, in font design units, of the em square for the specified style.
*Em square* is a typography term that refers to the rectangle occupied by the font's widest letter, traditionally the letter M.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> for which to get the em height.
The height of the em square.
Returns an array that contains all the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects available for the specified graphics context.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object from which to return <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects.
An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects available for the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
graphics is `null`.
Gets a hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
The hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
Returns the line spacing, in design units, of the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> of the specified style.
The line spacing is the vertical distance between the base lines of two consecutive lines of text.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> to apply.
The distance between two consecutive lines of text.
Returns the name, in the specified language, of this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
To indicate language neutral, you should specify 0 for the `language` parameter.
For a listing of the available languages and sublanguages, see the Winnt.h header file.

If you have [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] installed, this header file can typically be found relative to the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] installation directory at \\\VC\PlatformSDK\Include.
The language in which the name is returned.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the name, in the specified language, of this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
Indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> enumeration is available.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> to test.
`true` if the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> is available; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the name of this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the name of this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
Converts this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> to a human-readable string representation.
The string that represents this <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>.
